entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 08:02 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -33.5°C
Wind: S 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
